name: Case Simulator Weapons and Armors (itch)
description:
Unbox some of the most exotic Weapons and Armors skins in this brand new game.

Collect and improve rare Weapons and Armors.

Case Opener provides:
- The most realistic representation of opening
- Skin inventory
- A user-friendly interface
- All game functions available from the start - no need to level up!
- Inspect Items
- Preview Skins
- Weighted Skins
